body_html:
Eigen community included our fix for sqrt in the following commit https://mirror.bazel.build/bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/get/87636bcbdf12.tar.gz

We have created and are testing a PR to tensorflow to use the above Eigen to fix avx512 sqrt/rsqrt issue.
body_text:
Eigen community included our fix for sqrt in the following commit https://mirror.bazel.build/bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/get/87636bcbdf12.tar.gz
We have created and are testing a PR to tensorflow to use the above Eigen to fix avx512 sqrt/rsqrt issue.
body:
Eigen community included our fix for sqrt in the following commit https://mirror.bazel.build/bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/get/87636bcbdf12.tar.gz 

We have created and are testing a PR to tensorflow to use the above Eigen to fix avx512 sqrt/rsqrt issue.
